Gordon,
Jim has given you the best lists to pass on, but if you wish to point Mom
and kid in the direction of a bit of romance, you should give them the
reference to the 1965+/- men's magazine that had a very lurid article
supposedly by Albert Yamanaka with swords from Bumpei Usui's collection.
That piece as a list of lost treasures together with information on when
and here they were turned in and went missing. It includes kana spelling of
the names of various GI's who supposed accepted the swords. It is much more
fun than a simple list -- but probably  less accurate. The kid would also
probably like look at the dirty pictures in the mag and by today's
standard, Mom probably wouldn't mind. I have a copy, but I can't remember
the name.
Peter
